sentence.Network_en: He immure himself in a small room to work undisturbed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他自己关在小屋里埋头工作，以免受到骚扰。

sentence.Network_en: In time, the infection became known as " Acquired Immure Deficiency Syndrome "
sentence.Network_cn: 很快, 这种疾病被称为 “ 获得性免疫缺陷综合症 ”

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(67) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... immuration 监禁 immure 监禁 immurement 监禁.
词根及词缀 ... intramrual a 内部的，范围内的 immure v 监禁，禁闭 extramural a 墙外的，城外的.

list.abs: a study on immure genetic algorithm to determine noncircular critical slip surface of slopes ., 边坡非圆临界滑面之免疫遗传算法研究.
He is immured in prison ., 他被关在狱中.
The poet immured himself in an isolated outpost ., 这位诗人幽居在一个孤立的边远村落里.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French emmurer or medieval Latin immurare, from in- 'in' + murus 'wall'

means.word_mean: 1. lock up or confine, in or as in a jail;

sentences.sentence: "the murderer was incarcerated for the rest of his life"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 市外的, 单位以外的, 校际比赛的

intra在内+mural墙壁的→墙壁之内的
